description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called PlutoShell, which manages the main structure of the application's UI, including the bottom navigation bar and tab switching logic.

classes.name: PlutoShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a scaffold with a bottom navigation bar for switching between different tabs in the UI.

classes.name: _PlutoShellState
classes.description: State class managing current tab index, page widgets, and building the scaffold UI

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI consisting of an IndexedStack for pages and a NavigationBar for tab selection.
